nodes.text: Junior was the name of a Rancor kept in the pens of the Palace of the Eternal Dragon on Zakuul during the Grand Festival of Empress Vaylin in 3630 BBY. After the Eternal Empress Vaylin's speech was interrupted by the arrival of the Alliance Commander and the former Emperor Arcann, Beast master Oleg released Junior to deal with the captured Zakuulan rebels. However, the Alliance Commander and Theron Shan managed to get into the beast den and time and killed Junior before he could harm Indo Zal and the other rebels.
Junior appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne during "Chapter VI: The Dragon's Maw."
